header.title: CosPropertyService_PropertySetFactory

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosPropertyService::PropertySetFactory interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosProperty/include/CosPropertyService.hrl").

func.name: create_propertyset(Factory) -> PropertySet
func.fsummary: Create a new PropertySet with no predefined properties

desc.p: This operation creates a new PropertySet with no predefined properties.

func.name: create_constrained_propertyset(Factory, PropertyTypes, Properties) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Create a new PropertySetwith specified constraints

desc.p: This operation creates a new PropertySet with specific constraints. PropertyTypes states allowed TypeCode's and Properties valid CosPropertyService::Property data.

func.name: create_initial_propertyset(Factory, Properties) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Create a new PropertySetwith specified initial properties

type.v: Reason = invalid_property_name | conflicting_property | property_not_found | unsupported_type_code | unsupported_property | unsupported_mode | fixed_property | read_only_property

desc.p: This operation creates a new PropertySet with specific initial properties.
